definition: classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
only used in 濟濟|济济[ji3 ji3]
to cross a river/to aid or relieve/to be of help
used in place names associated with the Ji River 濟水|济水[Ji3 Shui3]/surname Ji

sentences.english: State-owned enterprises are the pillar of the national economy.
sentences.chinese: 國有企業是我國國民經濟的支柱。

sentences.english: Consumption rate is an important macroeconomic index used to reflect economic condition.
sentences.chinese: 消費率是反映國民經濟運行狀況的重要宏觀經濟指標。

sentences.english: They firmly took hold of all the lifelines of their national economy.
sentences.chinese: 他們把國民經濟的命脈都牢牢抓到自己手中。

sentences.english: Agriculture occupies an important place in the national economy.
sentences.chinese: 農業在國民經濟中佔有重要地位。

sentences.english: Manufacturing industry of the heavy equipments is major pillar of the national economy.
sentences.chinese: 重大型裝備製造業是國民經濟的重要支柱。

sentences.english: Sichuan Province is a big province in agriculture, of which rural economy is outstanding in national economy.
sentences.chinese: 四川省是農業大省，農村經濟在國民經濟中地位突出。

sentences.english: Agriculture is not only the foundation of the national economy but also a weak industry.
sentences.chinese: 農業是國民經濟的基礎產業，同時又是弱質產業。

sentences.english: How can we give a boost to the economy?
sentences.chinese: 怎樣才能把國民經濟搞上去？

sentences.english: In the past, forestry in China was taken as a basic industry of the national economy.
sentences.chinese: 過去中國林業曾經被定位爲國民經濟的基礎產業。

sentences.english: Agriculture is the primary industry, which is the basic industry of national economy.
sentences.chinese: 農業屬於第一產業，是國民經濟的基礎產業。

sentences.english: Water shortage has bottlenecked the sustainable development of the national economy.
sentences.chinese: 缺水已成爲影響國民經濟可持續發展的瓶頸因素。

sentences.english: Real estate vocation performs an important role during the development of economics.
sentences.chinese: 房地產業是國民經濟發展的主要支柱行業。

sentences.english: Pulp and paper industry is one of the major industries of national economy.
sentences.chinese: 製漿造紙工業是國民經濟的重要產業之一。

sentences.english: Machinery industry is a focal point on the advances of national economy .
sentences.chinese: 機械工業是國民經濟發展的重點。

sentences.english: We do not comment on national economics.
sentences.chinese: 我們對國民經濟不做評論。

sentences.english: Thus, The National Economy Mobilization (NEM) is a complex project of systems engineering.
sentences.chinese: 因此，國民經濟動員工作是一項複雜的系統工程。

definition: private business/opposite: state-owned enterprise 國有企業|国有企业[guo2 you3 qi3 ye4]
